Detailed Description

template<typename VarArray, typename MinVarRef>
struct MinConstraint< VarArray, MinVarRef >

constraints;max Description The constraint

max(vec, x)

ensures that x is equal to the maximum value of any variable in vec. constraints;max References See

help constraints min

for the opposite constraint. constraints;min Description The constraint

min(vec, x)

ensures that x is equal to the minimum value of any variable in vec. constraints;min References See

help constraints max

for the opposite constraint.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename VarArray , typename MinVarRef >
virtual triggerCollection MinConstraint< VarArray, MinVarRef >::setup_internal (  )  [inline, virtual]

Gets all the triggers a constraint wants to set up.

This function shouldn't do any propagation. That is full_propagate's job.

Definition at line 171 of file constraint_min.h.

template<typename VarArray , typename MinVarRef >
virtual bool MinConstraint< VarArray, MinVarRef >::get_satisfying_assignment ( box< pair< int, DomainInt > > &  assignment  )  [inline, virtual]

Looks for a valid partial assignment to a constraint.

The return value (in the box) is pairs of <varnum, domain value>, where varnum is in the same position as returned by get_vars.
